div.head: 乳汁清少
div.div: clear breast milk in small quantities

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: clear breast milk in small quantities

sense.def: Pathological Condition with women producing, during the breast-feeding period, only small quantities of clear, watery breast milk. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shu 鼠 quotes Zi mu mi lu 子母秘錄 : 乳汁清少， 死鼠一頭燒末，酒服方寸匕 , “[To cure women producing only] clear breast milk in small quantities have them ingest one square inch spoon of a burned and powderized head of a dead rat mixed with wine”.
